actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that the Attorney General shall extend for a period of six months the visa of any alien of Lebanon whose visa would expire during such period.

summary.text: Requires the Attorney General to take such measures as he deems necessary to extend for a period of six months from the date of enactment of this Act, the visa of any alien of Lebanon whose visa would expire, if not for the provisions of this Act, during such period.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Attorney General shall extend for a period of six months the visa of any alien of Lebanon whose visa would expire during such period.
